snippet: For power brokers, and even those who believe “bread is the devil,” Fred’s at Barneys New York is the place to see and be seen during lunch.
abstract: Neighborhood Joint column on Fred's at Barneys New York, an elegant Upper East Side restaurant that is a hangout for the rich and famous.
lead_paragraph: For power brokers, and even those who believe “bread is the devil,” Fred’s at Barneys New York is the place to see and be seen during lunch.

headline.print_headline: A Hidden Nest Atop Barneys To Make Deals
headline.seo: At Fred’s at Barneys, Power Lunches and Catty Chatter
